feed.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] RoadMap or Load o' Crap?

entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] RoadMap or Load o' Crap?
entry.summary: In the final post of the advent calendar, Jeremy Rubin discusses feasible schedules for deployment of upgrades to Bitcoin and the relevant window of opportunity for BIP-119 in 2022. He invites readers to use this as a starting point for discussion. The article can be found at https://rubin.io/bitcoin/2021/12/24/advent-27/. Jeremy ends the post by wishing Merry Christmas to those who celebrate and thanking everyone for joining along on the advent calendar ride.
